name: The Flying Crates (All Versions)
description:
Any Computer Can Run this Game.

If You Found any Bug or You Have an Idea for this Game You Can Comment your Idea.

This Game You can Click on Crates , Apples and Bombs.

The Crates Give You Score but If You Miss a Crate Your Lives will Decrease.

The Apples Give You One more Live but If You Miss It Your Lives Will not Decrease.

The Bomb Decrease Your Score If You Click on It, You Need to Miss It to Save Your Score.

New Update Every Saturday.

Updates
